sentences.en: " The little baggage hath witchcraft in her, I profess,'said he to Mr. Dimmesdale.
sentences.cn: “ 这小姑娘准是有魔法附体, 我敢说, ” 他对丁梅斯代尔先生说.

sentences.en: At this time he did not profess any particular religion.
sentences.cn: 现在,他不再拘泥某一宗教.

sentences.en: I don't profess expert knowledge of / to be an expert in this subject.
sentences.cn: 我并不自诩对这一问题内行[是这一问题的专家].

sentences.en: I don't profess to be an expert on that subject.
sentences.cn: 我不自认为是那个问题的专家.

sentences.en: I profess that I was surprised at the news.
sentences.cn: 我承认这消息使我惊讶.

sentences.en: I will not profess my bravery.
In court, the man was still professing his innocence.
sentences.cn: 在法庭上，该男子仍称自己是无辜的。

sentences.en: On cure, but erythromycin of collect of profess to convinced, antiphlogistic medicine.
sentences.cn: 治疗上, 可口服罗红霉素, 消炎药.

sentences.en: Religion: Almost all of the inhabitants profess Christianity and Roman Catholic.
sentences.cn: 宗教: 几乎所有居民都信奉基督教和罗马天主教.

sentences.en: Religion: Most inhabitants of Moldova profess the Orthodox Eastern Church.
sentences.cn: 宗教: 多数人信奉东正教.

sentences.en: She is going to profess modern languages.
She professed to hate her nickname.
They have become what they profess to scorn.
sentences.cn: 他们成了自己曾声称看不起的那种人.

sentences.en: Those who today pretend to be Christ's followers hypocritically profess to carry out those teachings now.
sentences.cn: 今天那些冒牌的基督教徒假惺惺地声称他们现在要实行这些教导.

sentences.en: Why do organisations profess that they care?
sentences.cn: 为什么机构都谎称自己对此很关心？

sentences.en: Why do organizations profess that they care?
sentences.cn: 为什么一些组织声称他们关心呢？

sentences.en: With such censures I cannot profess that I completely agree.
sentences.cn: 对于这些指责,我不能说我完全同意.

words.tran_cn: 声称的；公开承认的；伪称的
教授的；学者派头的；教授似的
在表面上；公然地；专业地
职业，专业；声明，宣布，表白
教授；教师；公开表示信仰的人
声称；断言；伪称（profess的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to say that you did not do something bad, especially a crime

trans.tran_cn: 声称，宣称，公开表明，信奉
trans.tran_en: If you profess to do or have something, you claim that you do it or have it, often when you do not
